post: I’ve been recently thinking that live is not worth it
Well, you are not the only one… I’ve had a shitty week so far.
You are so pesimist guys…  please cheer up.
I don’t think so… I think I’d be better off dead.
Have you ever thought about killing yourself?
Sure, most probably I’ll kill myself some time soon… so don’t miss me.
I just want to think positively.
